scripts.copy-json-files: cp package.json dist/ && cp src/app_modules/google-spreadsheet/*.json dist/src/app_modules/google-spreadsheet && cp -R src/configuration/users/templates dist/src/configuration/users && cp -R src/configuration/app/templates dist/src/configuration/app && cp -R src/resources dist/src && cp -R src/services/seed/data dist/src/services/seed && cp -R src/app_modules/integrations/oauth2/templates dist/src/app_modules/integrations/oauth2/templates
scripts.copy-json-files-to-build: cp -R src/app_modules/google-spreadsheet build/debug/src/app_modules && cp -R src/configuration/users/templates build/debug/src/configuration/users && cp -R src/configuration/app/templates build/debug/src/configuration/app && cp -R src/resources build/debug/src && cp -R src/services/seed/data build/debug/src/services/seed && cp -R src/app_modules/integrations/oauth2/templates build/debug/src/app_modules/integrations/oauth2/templates
scripts.build: tsc -p . --outDir dist && npm run copy-json-files && cp Dockerfile dist
scripts.copy-debug-local-files: cp package.json build/debug && cp src/app_modules/google-spreadsheet/*.json build/debug/src/app_modules/google-spreadsheet && cp -R src/configuration/users/templates build/debug/src/configuration/users && cp -R src/configuration/app/templates build/debug/src/configuration/app && cp -R src/resources build/debug/src && cp -R src/services/seed/data build/debug/src/services/seed && cp -R src/app_modules/integrations/oauth2/templates build/debug/src/app_modules/integrations/oauth2/templates
scripts.build-and-upload: tsc -p . --outDir dist && tar cvfz webapp-backend.tgz dist && scp -i ../scripts/kpibi-first-instance.pem webapp-backend.tgz ubuntu@app.kpibi.com:./releases
